attributes.action: have a strict Mp code of conduct that means if an Mp is found to have commited an offence, moral (cheating on his wife) or legal (fraud) then he should be permantly banned from parilment forever
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that if a representative of this country, is unable to control himself, how can he control the country. I think this person should be permanently excluded forever from all governmental positions. There should be a strict code of conduct which all Mps must sign

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
